title: A printed label - the top bold font
author: grlfriday

comments.content: I need to recreate this label, and scanning the foil label hasn't helped me, so here's a photo of it. I don't need the script, only the top bold font. Thank you!!!
[Lithos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054859/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/lithos/) by Carol Twombly. Though your sample seems somewhat compressed.
